column1: @entity0 was cleaning his room and giving away some of the toys that he no longer used. @entity0 put a duck and a truck in the pile to give away. He added a car and a blanket and a push mower to the give a way pile. @entity0 liked the car and took it out of the give a way pile, so he did not give the car away. @entity0 put a broken phone into the trash can. @entity0 also threw away two books and some used crayons. As @entity0 was cleaning his room his mother came in to help. @entity0 and his mother cleaned most of the room. When they were almost finished @entity0's father also came in to help. @entity0 picked up the duck and the truck and took it to the car. @entity0's father picked up the blanket and the push mower and took them out to the car. @entity0's mother carried the trash can down to the large garbage can outside. @entity0's room was all cleaned.
@placeholder carried the toys out to the car
